1453590.name: Ambient Channels: Lost Metro - Underground Parking
1453590.description:
In the 'Lost Metro' series, humanity has fled the city due to a zombie infestation. In the 'Underground Parking' episode, you'll find an abandoned parking garage with a couple of remaining zombies stumbling around looking for lunch.

Note: This episode has a depiction of wondering zombies with some blood and gore. Zombies do not interact with the user, but may be frightening for young viewers.

This episode is currently ambiance only and does not include a hidden objects game.
1453590.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
